game.name: Dreaming Worlds
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dive into the dreaming worlds of the four dream keepers and find out why they don't answer anymore. Rescue the trapped inhabitants of the dream worlds, change the dreams back to good and discover mysterious places and puzzles. But something dark will stand in your way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into the dreaming worlds of the four dream keepers and find out why they don't answer anymore. Rescue the trapped inhabitants of the dream worlds, change the dreams back to good and discover mysterious places and puzzles. But something dark will stand in your way.
game.developers: Dominik Wolff, Games by Dominik Wolff
